title: Cloud Architecture Center - Storage resources
abstract:
# Cloud Architecture Center - Storage resources
Last reviewed 2024-02-02 UTC
The Architecture Center provides content resources across a wide variety of storage subjects.
content:
## Get started
If you are new to Google Cloud or new to designing storage architectures on Google Cloud, begin by reading [Design an optimal storage strategy for your cloud workload](/architecture/storage-advisor) .
## Storage resources in the Architecture Center
You can filter the following list of storage resources by typing a product name or a phrase that's in the resource title or description.
